pullRequest.title: Check project on url
pullRequest.bodyText: Checks if a user is assigned to a project from the given id in the url for pages, where navigation can happen via URL.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 *            the specific processId
          
          
            
                 *            the specific projectId

Instead of adding a new constant that basically just adds the .jsf suffix to the value of DEFAULT_LINK in the prior line, it would be less redundant to just add that suffix to the existing constant and reuse it. DEFAULT_LINK is currently only used for the referrer URL parameter in some places, and for that purpose desktop.jsf works as well as just desktop.
